event.title: Azure Training Demo In Bangalore
event.description:
Intellipaat is organising a free demo for Azure learners online. The demo is for the Azure Training in Bangalore to help master various concepts of cloud platform solutions, implementation, virtualization, deploying Azure web apps.

What more can you learn in Azure Training?

  1. Managing Azure subscriptions and access control
  2. Implementing and managing Azure Resources
  3. Implementing and managing Azure Resources
  4. Building, managing and deplying Virtual Machines
  5. Azure Site Recovery
  6. and much more

Cities where Azure Training is going on:

1) Azure Training in Pune
2) Azure Training in Hyderabad
3) Azure Training in Chennai
event.address: Khykha Court, 1st Floor, No.5, I Cross, Madiwala, Hosur Road, 1st Cross Rd, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560068
